snippet.title: ZHEROS - Behind the scenes
snippet.description:
ZHEROS is finally out on Xbox and we wanted to share with you a small behind the scenes in our studio.
If you're a Live Gold Member you can download the game for FREE till February 15th 2016, so don't miss it.

Coming soon also on PC and PS4, so stay tuned.

ZHEROS official website: http://www.zherosgame.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/zherosgame
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ZherosGame

Rimlight Studios: http://www.rimlightstudios.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/rimlightstudios
Twitter: https://twitter.com/rimlightgames
